constraints.name: substring_extraction
constraints.description: 从一个字符串中提取子串，子串的起始和结束位置在给定范围内
constraints.formal: S(i) = S(x)[lo:hi], 0 <= x < i, 0 <= lo <= hi <= length(S(x))

constraints.name: concatenation_operation
constraints.description: 将两个字符串连接成一个新的字符串

constraints.name: length_bound
constraints.description: 任何生成的字符串长度不会超过给定的最大值

constraints.name: alphabet_constraint
constraints.description: 字符串中的字符必须是小写字母

constraints.name: modulo_sum
constraints.description: 最终字符串的所有字符的ASCII码之和对给定模数取模
